name: AERONAI SCHOOL OF AVIATION
about: Aeronai School of Aviation is a premier institution dedicated to enhancing aviation performance and compliance. We offer a comprehensive range of training programs designed to meet the unique technical, legal, and regulatory requirements of our clients. With a focus on cost-effective strategies, our programs are tailored to increase efficiency and performance in the aviation industry. Our commitment is to ensure each customer's needs are met and exceeded, providing top-notch training and support to foster excellence in aviation. At Aeronai, we strive to be the benchmark for aviation education and training.
services:
["Civil Air Law and Regulation
Aviation Indoctrination
Aircraft Mass & Balance and Performance
Navigation
Air Traffic Management
Meteorology
Flight Planning
Flight Monitoring
Dangerous Goods
Communications
Security
Human Factors (Dispatch resource Management)"]
